revision.text: Note: The minimum harvest amount for any berry is 1. If the harvest amount is less than 1, you will still get at least 1. However, having a harvest amount of less than 1 affects how many berries you get from [[Farm_Items|Rich Mulch]] and Passho berries. For example, with Rich Mulch and surrounded by 8 Passho berries, a Maranga will yield 16 berries, but a Liechi will only yield 8 berries. For some helpful farming configurations to harvest more berries or grow berries faster, consult the [[Farming Setups|Farming Setups page]]
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
